inn1.comm: short of a good length on middle, coming back in just a hint, gets on the back foot and punches it to cover
pushed it fuller, in the channel outside off, guided down to third man for a single
drawing him forward by hurling it full outside off, gets to the pitch and defends it down to cover
fullish outside off, rocks back and chops it down to point
overpitched, is calmly forward, gets to the pitch and pushes it down to mid-off
slower one this time, cutting in towards off from a good length on middle, defended from the crease into the off side
punished, short and wide, Vermeulen stood tall and crashed it through mid-off and cover for his first boundary, nice, sweet sound of bat striking ball
back of a length on the off, punched down to mid-on from the crease

gone! Bangladesh have broken through early, slightly short on middle and leg, stays his ground and flicks it straight to short midwicket where Junaid holds on to a sharp catch, timed it well but could not keep it down
pushed him back, bowled short and quick on middle, gets back and defends it onto the pitch
short of a good length on middle, worked down to midwicket off the back foot
slightly short on middle and leg, taps it down to midwicket from the crease
cutting in from leg stump towards middle and off, defended back to Rasel
similar delivery, just a little shorter, Masakadza gets onto the back foot and pushes it back to the bowler
"great area buddy" shouts Mushfiqur as Rasel gets this one to keep low, Masakadza did well to get his bat down in time
straying on the pads, slightly short, tries to clip it fine but is struck high on the pads
back of a length on middle and off, pushed off the back foot to mid-off
lands on a good length on middle and off, held its line, defended to cover, quiet start
pitched up on middle and leg, bowled from side of the crease and angled in, defended with a straight bat to mid-on
slightly short on the off stump, makes way to run it down towards third man for a single
probing him outside off, bowling it in the corridor, Masakadza gets forward, closes the face and plays it back to the bowler
went after it though he didn't connect it well, meaty length ball on the pads, just chips it over midwicket for a couple of runs
connects this superbly, not to the pitch but it makes no difference, bowled on a good length outside off, gets forward and with a free swing of the arms clears the long-on boundary comfortably
change of pace, slower one this time, guided down to point
cutting away towards off from middle, knocks it down to cover off the front foot
erring in length as well as line, short outside leg stump, a gift for Coventry who rocks back and helps it on its way to the fine-leg boundary
missed it, tried to force it hard off the back foot but it kept low and zipped under the bat through to the keeper
a touch fuller this time, opting to play from the crease, tapped to mid-off
slower ball on leg stump, waited for it, closed the face and dropped it between midwicket and square leg for a single
leapt up from the pitch this time, moved back and cut it straight to point
back of a length outside off, just a hint of inward movement, pushed towards cover on the back foot
wide down the leg side, too short, Coventry failed to make contact as he tried to get it past short fine
another wide, the keeper fumbles this time but no damage done, another short delivery down the leg side, a run gifted
slightly short on middle, better, Coventry is guarded, moving back and defending it solidly to cover
targeting the good-length area outside off, Coventry waits for it and taps it past the bowler to mid-off
short of a good length on middle and off, watches it on to the bat and plays it back to the bowler
timed it really well, was overpitched on middle and off, forced it from the crease back towards the bowler who fielded it well bending low on his follow through
fullish on the off stump, pushed through straight to cover
stump-to-stump is the mantra for Rasel, just a fraction short on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
landing on a good length on leg stump, pushed through to midwicket
back of a length on middle, punched down to long-on for a single
coming back in from a good length outside off, forced it off the back foot back to the bowler, shouts of "catch it" from the keeper who thought that went off the boot
slower one this time, cut away as he tried to defended it back to the bowler, produced a thick edge past point for a single
spoils the tidy over with one bowled short on leg stump, Masakadza has no trouble whipping it away off his pads down to the fine-leg boundary
Coventry launches into that one, it was in the slot, Mahbubul bowled it full outside off and he went after it, getting forward and swinging it hard over long-on, good, confident strike

dropped, beautiful shot but too well timed, overpitched on middle, picked it superbly, clipping it straight to deep square leg where Rasel makes a complete mess of it, how costly will that prove? They dropped Chigumbura twice yesterday
good running, keeping it down this time, clipped off the pads through square leg for a couple more
misfield, the fielding is atrocious, Ashraful the culprit this time, full and wide, creams it through mid-off where Ashraful, diving forward, fails to get his body behind it
Bangladesh are losing the initiative here, slips it down the leg side this time, given a wide
Enamul does a good job in the deep, smacks it over the bowler's head in the direction of long-on where Enamul runs across and drags it back just inside the ropes, two more to the total
poor ball but gets away with it, full on middle and leg, driven hard but straight to midwicket, 16 off the over, the pressure has come off
slower through the air, lands on leg and moves it towards middle, defended to cover
four more, he's done this a few times today, bowling it short on leg stump, Coventry just has to get it past short fine, does so elegantly and earns four
poor line this, another one on leg stump and he has a short fine in place, closes the face and rolls it past that fielder for three more
alters his line this time, bowls it short outside off, eased through mid-off and cover for a single
good, attacking batting, raises the 50-run stand by slicing it over point for a boundary, was overpitched and he dealt with it appropriately
another wide down the leg side, called by the umpire, the runs are leaking here
on leg stump but much fuller than usual, pushed away from the crease to midwicket
round the wicket, fires it flat towards middle, gets an inside edge onto his pads as he tries to force it through the off side
went with the arm and missed leg stump by a whisker, shortish, made room and tried to drive it past the bowler but made no contact
came down the track, got to the pitch and pushed it down to long-on for a single
fullish on middle, closes the face and plays it to midwicket
slightly short on leg stump, tickles it wide of short fine for a single to keep the strike, good start by the Bangladesh captain
bowled it short on middle, punched down to long-on for a single
slower through the air, on leg stump, worked away towards Mahmudullah at deep square leg for one more
fired it quick on middle, pushed wide of the diving bowler off the back foot to long-on for a single
gave it some air this time, lands on a good length outside off, played back to the bowler
short on middle, makes room and punches it to midwicket
taps it into the off side this time, made way and pushed it to cover
excellent footwork, came forward before it was delivery and adjusted to the length superbly once it was pitched short outside off, made room and dispatched it through the covers off the back foot
short again but on middle and leg this time, played to midwicket
pushed it on a good length outside off, defended to cover
gave it plenty of air and Coventry takes the invitation, steps out of the crease, gets to the pitch and smashes it over mid-off and cover for four more
the pressure's getting to the bowler, fires it down the leg side, called a wide
much slower this time, short outside off but not wide enough to cut, almost drags it on as he gets an inside edge
flighted on middle and leg, driven down to long-on for a single
tossed up on middle, reaches forward and defends it back to the bowler
slightly short on the off stump, knocked down to cover
it's wide outside off and he frees his arms, getting forward and flaying it over cover for a boundary, just one away from a well-deserved half-century
angling it in towards middle,watches it closely and defends it with bat close to pad
he's swung the momentum firmly back Zimbabwe's way, tossed up on middle, works it into the leg side behind square for a single to reach his 50
flighted on middle, Masakadza uses his feet well, dancing down the track and turning it past midwicket for a couple more
tossed up on middle, driven down to long-on for a single
bowled it flat this time, came down the track and bunted it down to long-off, giving Coventry most of the strike
slightly short on middle, punched off the back foot to  long-on
they're doing it well here, flighted on middle, takes it on the full and cracks it to long-on
tossed up just outside off, eased straight to cover
back of a length on middle, struck down to long-on, one more

didn't get hold of it but still managed to find the ropes, the fielder in the dep didn't pick it, tossed up on middle, went for the slog-sweep, got the top edge and it landed just wide of deep midwicket where the fielder spotted it really late, didn't get to it in time and conceded a boundary
slower this time, tries to drive it straight, gets an inside edge onto the pads
pushed into the leg side off the front foot to midwicket
struck back to the bowler from the crease
threw it up outside off, played down straight to cover, good comeback after that boundary
tossed up outside off, closes the face and turns it to midwicket

that was totally unnecessary from Masakadza! Tossed it up outside off, came down the track, struck it well but didn't get the desired elevation or distance, straight down long-on's throat where Raqibul takes a good low catch
slightly short on the off, pushed off the back foot to cover
on middle and leg, worked away off the back foot to midwicket
four dot balls in a row, gets back and taps it  to cover, things have evened out now, a spring in the step of the Bangladesh fielders
firing it straight on middle, Taylor is off the mark, shuffling a touch and turning it through square leg
tossed up on middle, closed the face, got back and worked it to square leg
flighted outside off, easing it through cover for a single
hurled it short on leg stump, a long hop, opportunity missed, tried to pull it square, is hit high on the pads
flighted on middle and leg, worked away straight to short fine
flatter, gets to the pitch by getting front and across, turns it away wide of midwicket for a quick single
tossed it up outside off, pushed through to midwicket off the front foot
full outside off, drilled down the ground to long-on
held back the length there, short on middle and leg, punched to midwicket
tossed it up on middle, Mushfiqur's chirping away, worked down to midwicket, another dot ball, the pressure builds
flighted outside off, driven with a flourish towards long-off for a single
a touch too straight, nudged behind square for a single
fired it quick on middle, defended into the leg side towards square leg
close shout for lbw, angling it in from wide of the crease on middle and off, Taylor shuffles to work it square but is struck on the pads in line, it didn't spin, held its line, looked mighty close
fired it down the leg side, another wide

close shout for lbw, short on middle, held its line again, fired it in really quick, moved across to turn it square, was struck high on the pads and but it seemed to be going on, another close call, the umpire is unmoved
shortish on middle and leg, closes the face and turns it past short fine for a couple
pushed back to the bowler off the back foot
shortish on middle, rocks back and punches it back to the bowler
easing it through the off side through the covers for a single
quicker through the air on middle and leg, pushed straight to midwicket
a touch too straight, tickled into the vacant square-leg region for a single
slightly short outside off, just dropped it short of point where Siddique is a little lethargic getting to it, they complete a quick single

excellent fielding by Raqibul in the deep, pitched up and it grazed back down the pitch wide of long-on where Raqibul dives full length to his left to drag it inside the ropes and keep them down to two
tosses it up on middle, gets to the pitch and plays it back to the bowler
shortish on the off, gets forward and bunts it past cover for a single

big shout for lbw, bowled it flat and short on middle, got across to sweep it square, missed it and was rapped on the pads, looked plumb, was struck in front of middle but the umpire Sahiba was unmoved

gone this time! Angling it in towards middle again, not spinning it too much, Taylor got across the line to turn it into the leg side, missed it again was struck right in front of middle and off, the umpire had no hesitation this time and raised his finger immediately
shortish outside off, cut away to point from the crease
flighted on middle, driven down the ground to long-on
short on middle, pushed back to the bowler from the crease
tossed up outside off, crashed down towards long-off for a single
coming round the wicket to the left hander, short on leg stump, whipped behind square for one more
short on middle, forced off the back foot but straight to the bowler
cramping him for room here, short on middle, struck straight to midwicket
back of a length outside off, opens the face and taps it behind point for a single
on middle and leg, pushed gently down to long-on for a single
gave it some air outside off, got forward and guided it down to short third, called for a single but it wasn't there
full on middle and off, driven back to the bowler
slightly short on middle, came down the track and pushed it straight to mid-off where the fielder prevents the single
looping it in towards middle, defended to midwicket from the crease
another tidy over, flights it full on the off stump, pushed straight through to mid-off
shortish on the off stump, makes a little room and drops it dead short of cover
throws it up outside off, charges down the track and smacks it straight to long-off
a rush of blood for Williams who came down the track and tried to clear mid-on but didn't time it well, fell just short of the fielder
overpitched on middle, connects it reasonably well this time, carting it over midwicket for a couple of runs

Zimbabwe are sliding here! Short on the off stump, sensed an opportunity there, rocked back to smash it over midwicket, didn't come on to him as quickly as he expected, ended up getting an inside edge straight onto the stumps
quicker through the air, fullish outside off, defended with a lunge back onto the pitch
flighted on the off stump, pushed through firmly to long-off for a single
threw it up on middle, tried to force it back past the bowler but didn't have enough timing behind it
saw him coming down and fired it short, Matsikenyeri adjusted to the length well, defending it short of cover
flighted outside off, taps it down back on the pitch
angling into middle and leg, whipping it square for a single to get off the mark
lands on a good length just a fraction outside off, reaches forward and defends it into the off side, just one off the over
nudged away, quicker outside off, opened the face and knocked it in the direction of point for a single
tossed it up outside off, pushed firmly but straight to cover
nicely struck, short outside off, waited for it to turn in and slapped it between long-off and deep cover for a couple
short outside off, swatted back straight to the bowler off the back foot
long hop, punched down the ground to long-on for a single
landing on a good  length outside off and turning in, got well outside the line to sweep it down, got a bit of bat to it, single wide of short fine
fires it full on middle, tries to swipe it square, gets a leading edge but falls short of square leg
fullish on middle, closes the face and works it down to midwicket, quick single
slightly short on middle, smacked down to long-on off the back foot
fired it full on middle, turned away straight to midwicket
fullish on leg stump, pushed straight to midwicket, the runs have dried up
slower, bowled short outside off, made room and chopped it straight to point, there's no single on offer
back of a length on middle, slapped straight to midwicket off the back foot
short and wide and takes advantage, making room and cutting it hard behind point, gets three runs
quicker, short on the off and spinning in, pushed back to the bowler
moved across, stood tall and drove it past the bowler to long-on for one more
short outside off, turning in, tries to force it through cover but is a little late on it, plays it back to the bowler

finally, sensed a chance with one that was bowled full and straight, had a bit of flight on it as well, charged down the track and dismissed it over the bowler's head into the sightscreen for a much-needed, pressure-relieving six
pushed it full just outside off, but not much flight, played back to the bowler
low full toss on middle, comes down the track and drills it down to long-on
striking it sweetly here, full outside off, driven hard down to long-off
saw him step out and fired it full on middle, dug out to extra cover
there are some vacant spaces in the off side, Matsinkenyeri dances down and smacks this wide of deep cover for a couple of runs
tossed up outside off, sliced it past point into the deep for a single
quicker outside off, knocks it wide of cover, calls foe a single but it isn't there, sent back in time
oversteps and is costly, straying on the pads, Matsikenyeri has picked his spot, shuffles, bends low and sweeps it down the fine-leg boundary, and because it's a no-ball, he's earned a freehit
short and wide, makes room and slaps it down to long-on, didn't connect it well
slower through the air, pushed through to cover off the front foot
flat, spinning in from outside leg stump, worked away wide of midwicket for a single
slightly short on the off, punched back to the bowler from the crease
tossed up on middle, pushed gently just wide of long-on and has enough time to make it back for the second, they're stepping it up now
spun away from a good length on middle, didn't pick it, tried to swipe it across the line, got a leading edge but was lucky it fell wide of the bowler, managed a single
on middle and off, pushed to cover from the crease
throws it up outside off, driven through the covers into the deep for a single
tossed up on leg stump, gets forward and defends it watchfully back to the bowler
fired it short outside off, crashed off the front foot to deep cover for a single
long hop, chased the batsman as he made some room, Coventry just rolled his wrists over it and got it past square leg for a single
full on middle, comes down and drives it straight to midwicket
fires it down the leg side, Matsikenyeri tries to get some bat to it but doesn't, a wide signalled
bowled full on middle, comes down and pushes it towards midwicket
tossed up on middle, driven back to the bowler
short on leg stump, worked away through midwicket for a single
a gift delivery, really, low full toss outside off, Coventry latches onto it quickly, bending low and lofting it into the gap between long-off and deep cover for a boundary
turned away into the leg side wide of square leg for a single
flighted outside off, smacked through to deep cover for one more
comes down and pushes it through to cover
full toss on leg stump, pulled away behind square for a single, long leg is in place
flighted on middle, tries to work it square but gets a leading edge, falls well short of midwicket
tossed it up outside off, drove it back wide of the bowler but Ashraful dived to his left to prevent the single
fullish outside off, reaches for it and drives it back to the bowler

drive it hard down the ground back to the bowler who got a hand to it, deflected it just wide of the stumps and Coventry would have been in trouble had it gone on to hit the stumps, no damage done in the end
hurls the first bouncer of the day, banged in short on middle and off, the batsman ducks under it with no difficulty
low full toss on middle, whipped away wristily through square leg into the deep for a single
banged in short on middle, rocked back and pulled it hard through square leg into the deep, a misfield at deep square leg allows them to come back for the second, brings up the 50-stand
slower one this time, the offcutter, bunts it off the front foot towards deep cover for a single
slightly short outside off, guided wide of point for a single
he's inching towards a century here, short and wide, moved away and cut it hard behind point for a couple of runs
short of a length outside off, rocks back and punches it down to deep cover for a single
slightly short on leg stump, comes down the track and works it into the vacant gap wide of midwicket, the fielder from the deep takes a while coming in and they get two
back of a length, gets on the back foot and strokes it wide of long-on through midwicket for a couple more, they're doing it well here
slightly short on middle, pushed away to midwicket, finds the fielder this time
good delivery, shot off the pitch from a good length outside off, tried to nudge it past the keeper but it had already whizzed past him
short and wide, much slower this time and Coventry was already through with the attempted cut before it went past him, good change of pace
back to normal, tries to force it hard off the back foot through cover, bowled short again but mistimes it to midwicket
good over this, full and wide, tries to caress it through cover but is a little late on it, the keeper fumbles and allows a single
overpitched on middle, drilled down the ground towards long-on for a single
wide down the leg side, Coventry fails to get a touch to it, an easy opportunity to get to three figures but he'll take the wide
full and wide, strikes it through the line to long-off for a single to keep the strike
slightly short on middle, pushed from the crease to midwicket
slightly short on middle and leg, gets it much squarer this time, single to the total
flat and wide of the off stump, drags it down to deep square leg
flighted outside off, waited for it, opened the face and guided it in front of point for a single, gets to 99
threw it up outside off, came down the track and smote it down to long-on
reaches his maiden ODI ton with a strike down to long-on, raises his arms, embraces his partner and the delight of reaching that milestone is writ large on his face, excellent knock
Mahbubul continues to gift them wides down the leg side, Zimbabwe won't mind it
full and wide, gets his left foot out to smash that through cover, gets a free swing of the bat but is nowhere near it
banged in short outside leg stump, mistimes it to fine leg for a single
short of a good length outside off, chopped down to deep cover for a single
gets much more bat on it this time, bowled short on leg stump, shuffles across and pulls it down wide of fine leg for a couple of runs

he's taken it but behind the ropes! Full and wide, a meaty length delivery, Coventry stayed his ground and swung that over long-on, Raqibul was stationed perfectly for it and took it well over his head but had stepped beyond the boundary when he clasped it

poor delivery, I don't think we'll see more of him for this spell, short outside leg stump, a gift delivery which Coventry helps down comfortably to the fine-leg boundary, the partnership swells to 83
full outside leg, tries to glance it down, gets struck on the pads and they scramble a leg bye
back of a length on middle, pushed wide of midwicket for a single
shout for lbw, full, Matsikenyeri bent low and got across to paddle it down, was hit on the pads, would have missed off and was struck outside the line
overpitched outside off, driven wide of cover for a single
targeting the blockhole on middle, dug out wide of midwicket, there's no run available
pitched up on middle, tried to swing it hard past the bowler, drilled it into the ground straight to him

big shout for lbw, Shakib's not impressed with the decision, angling it in towards middle and leg, gets well forward to paddle it fine, is struck on the pads but replays indicate that may have been going down
short, and wide down the leg side, for the umpteenth time this innings
back of a length outside off, punched down towards deep cover for a single
appeal for run out, fullish on middle, swung wide of midwicket, calls for a second and despite an accurate throw to the non-striker's end from Ashraful, Matsikenyeri has made it back just in time
quickish on middle, pushed into the leg side short of midwicket
quicker through the air, short on middle and leg, paddled down wide of fine leg for a single
Zimbabwe are coasting along now, bowled full and wide, Coventry stepped out while making room simultaneously and lofted it into the gap wide of deep cover for a boundary
good length on middle, stroked down towards long-on for a single
has a massive heave at it, was lucky to get an inside edge onto his pads or was plumb, a single wide of cover
targeting the blockhole outside off, gets it right, tries to dig it out but is unable to
overpitched outside off, slices it down towards deep point for a single
had a good hard swing at it, he's going for it now, pitched up outside off, made way and dragged it well over midwicket, getting it wide of long-on for a boundary, brings up the century-stand
low full toss outside off, crashed wide of long-off for a couple of runs, a fumble in the outfield reflects Bangladesh's desperation
short outside off, cut away behind point for a couple of runs

dropped and run-out, full on middle, crashes it back towards the bowler who palms it away with his outstretched hands, struck really hard, Matsikenyeri calls for a single but is sent back a little too late, by then Shakib has recovered and hurled a throw back to the keeper who takes off the bails in time to find him short
lands on a good length outside off, struck straight to cover
presents the full face again as he drives it to cover off the front foot
angling it into the pads from wide of the crease, tries to work it down past midwicket, is struck on the pads but that would have been sliding down
short on middle, pulled away to deep square leg for a couple of runs
shortish outside off, had made his mind up to paddle that fine but the line wasn't right, defended it to cover
full outside off, drilled down the ground to long-off
fired it in short on middle and off, tries to paddle it down, huge appeal from the bowler as it raps him on the pads but it struck him well outside the line
bowled full on middle and leg, went for the sweep again, struck hard on the pads but that would have been sliding down
superb timing and adjustment, bowled short after the bowler saw him coming down, altered his shot according to the length and drove it straight and hard past the bowler between long-on and long-off
flighted on middle, smacked one bounce wide of long-on for a single
fires a wide down the leg side, a run gifted
worked away through square leg for a couple

dropped, Mahmudullah the culprit, tried to sweep it hard through square, got the top edge and it sailed down to deep square leg, the fielder had all the time in the world to get into position but spilled it just when it seemed he was in control of it, another life for the centurion
short and wide, slapped away off the back foot wide of deep cover for a couple of runs
tossed up, Chigumbura's eyes light up, charges down the track and dispatches it miles over long-on for a massive six
had picked his spot, bowled short on the off, moved away and lofted it over the covers for a boundary
pushed through to long-off, in fact just wide of him for a couple
two more, short on middle, punched wide of long-on
gets to his 150 by dancing down and clipping that wide of long-on for a couple more
made room and the bowler chased him, tried to sweep it hard but missed it, was struck on the pads
they're piling it on here, that's disappeared, full on middle, made room and cracked him miles over the deep midwicket boundary for another big one
Chigumbura continues the good work, short outside off, makes way and swats it through cover for a boundary
fired in on the pads, tries to whip it away, is caught on the pads, they get a leg bye
Coventry's in a destructive mood now, flighted on middle, got into the perfect position to execute the slog-sweep, got it off the middle, sailed over deep midwicket
another one, can he break Saeed Anwar's record? Another slog-sweep, didn't quite get hold of it, got a bit of a top edge there but had enough bat on it to clear deep midwicket once again

carnage, the change of angle proves useless for Shakib, over the wicket, bowled full on middle and off, swung away, this time just one bounce, to the deep midwicket boundary, three hits in the same region
followed him as he made way, short on leg stump, tries to smack it square, didn't get hold of it
full on the off, driven down to long-on for a single
full and wide, sliced it over point for a couple more
slightly short on leg stump, mistimes a slog, gets a single

Chigumbura has holed out! When he connected it, it seemed he would clear the ropes easily but ended up getting more elevation than distance, tried to clear long-on but found Naeem who didn't have to move much to pouch that
Coventry, though, continues his merry way, full and wide, makes room and picks the gap over cover, carts it over the in-field for four more
that was a tough chance, would not be fair to call it a drop, short on middle, pulled away hard just short of midwicket, Shakib lunged forward to cup that but could not get his hands down in time
full outside off, drilled down to long-off for a single
wide down the leg side, they're bleeding runs here, another one to an already imposing score
low full toss outside off, driven down to long-off for a single
targeting the blockhole, driven down to long-on for a single
full outside off, dug out towards point from the crease, no run there
short outside leg stump, struck down to short fine for a single to give Coventry the strike
low full toss on middle, swung away just wide of long-on who keeps them down to just a single
yorker, dot ball, full just outside off, tried to force it through cover, got an inside edge onto his pads
just six more away, feeding him with a length ball outside off, made room and clattered it into the stands over long-on, just one more hit
slower one bowled full outside off, cracked down to deep cover for a single, reaches 190
overpitched outside off, driven straight to extra cover who fumbles to allow them to breeze through to a single
yorker on middle, dug out towards long-on, just the one
bowled'im! Full and straight, tries to crack it over the bowler's head, misses and the stumps take a beating!
full outside off, driven straight to deep cover, just the single
slower one bowled just outside leg stump and cutting in, he tries to work it past square leg, is struck on the pads and is given! Pitched outside leg that one, Coventry will have to wait
a boundary! They were on their way to get a single, picks the slower one wide of long-on, the fielder overruns it to concede a boundary, Coventry will have to wait again
two more, short on leg stump, pulled away wide of fine leg, why two? His partner's on the verge of a major landmark here, a single should have been fine
pitched up on middle, struck away to deep midwicket for a single
full toss outside off, slaps it back past the bowler wide of long-off for a couple to equal the world record!!

inn2.comm: short of a good length on middle, turned away behind square, there's no single available
back of a length on middle, gets back and pushes it to cover
slipping down the leg side, given a wide, Bangladesh open their account
lands on a good length outside off, trying to tempt him into playing the drive, left alone to the keeper
fuller, just a fraction outside off, driven wide of the diving bowler for a single to mid-on
straying on the pads, bowled full, driven straight to deep midwicket for a single
short of a length, cut away hard down to third man for a single
round the wicket, bowled on a length on middle and off, held its line, defended solidly back to the bowler
hurled it short on middle, went for the pull, he favours that shot but was struck high on the thighs
beaten this time, angling it from round the wicket, Tamim drove at it inside the line and it just escaped the outside edge
targeting middle and off, lands on a good length, gets forward and taps it to short cover
on middle and off, rocked back, waited for it, closed the face and worked it through square leg for a single
presents the full face as he drives this fullish delivery on leg stump back to the bowler
short of a good length on the off, stays his ground and eases it to short cover
timed it well, a touch too straight from Mupariwa, works it away wristily through midwicket, Waller gives chase and cuts it off but they've taken three
slightly short on middle and off, pushes it through the line to mid-off
just a fraction short on middle, whipped away through to deep midwicket for a single
short of a good length just on the off, punched to cover from the crease
well fielded at square leg by Waller, short on leg stump, turned away elegantly and Waller threw himself to his left to prevent a certain four
just a fraction short and he's on it quickly, rocks back and pulls it away hard over midwicket for a boundary
slower one this time, a short offcutter, tapped of the back foot to point
short and wide, cuts it away wide of third man for a couple more
short and wide again, cut away hard wide of point, Matsikenyeri runs across from third man to cut it off, slides but ends up palming it away to the ropes, four more
beaten this time, surprised by one that shot off the pitch, tried to nudge it down to third man but it had zipped past him
kicks it in front of point this time, they're getting a move-on, pushed in short outside off, flat-bats it through mid-off and cover for another four
they're forcing the pace now, Waller's just about managed to drag it back in but he's given them enough time to run all four, whipped away through midwicket off the back foot
slower one bowled full on middle, turned away just wide of Waller at deep midwicket for a single
straying on the pads again, clipped away to short fine, there's no single available
slightly short on middle, punched down the ground to long-on for a single
another wide down the leg side, attempted slower one but misdirected, one more to the total
slightly short on middle and off, pushes it down the ground to long-on
through midwicket's legs, a misfield, worked away off the front foot and fielder makes a mess of it to concede two more
short of a good length just outside off, was the slower one, jabbed it back to the bowler
through the gap, hurled it short outside off and Tamim had little trouble flaying it between point and cover for four more
it's coming on nicely now, stood tall and drove it hard but straight to mid-off
slower one bowled short on middle, went for the pull, attempting to clear square leg, was too early into the shot, it cut away to just miss off
back of a length on middle and off, punched straight to cover
slower one bowled slightly short on leg stump, turned away down to fine leg for a single
full toss on middle, driven through midwicket, wide of the fielder in the deep for a couple more
slightly short on the off stump, gets back and crunches it to mid-off past the bowler
finds the gap and it races through the outfield, back of a length outside off, forced hard off the back foot through the vacant gap between cover and mid-off for four more
slower one bowled full on middle, pushed through the line to long-on for a single
short of a good length on middle, worked away wide of midwicket for a couple more, the runs are coming along easily
pitched up on middle and leg, stroked it down the ground to long-on
tries to crash it through the covers from the crease, slightly short, but mistimes it straight to the fielder
banged in short on middle, rolls his wrists over it to pull it down to deep square leg to bring up the 50-stand, just the start they needed

missed run-out, slower one bowled on a good length on middle and leg, the fine leg is up and Junaid just turns it wide of him, Mupariwa takes time to hurl it back in and they attempt to run all four, a shy at the stumps at the non-striker's end from Taylor, Tamim would have been found short had that hit
poor delivery appropriately dealt with, angling it in on the pads and Junaid just has to tickle it past short fine for a boundary
down the leg side, tries to whack it to fine leg, misses but earns an extra run
another one, slower ball misdirected, down the leg side again, too many wides in this game
short of a good length on middle, pushed off the back foot to cover
the fine leg has been pushed back, fortunately for Chigumbura. He bowls another horrible delivery short on the leg stump, pulled away straight into the deep for a single
round the wicket, slightly short on the off stump, chipped short of extra cover
gave it some air this time, pushed it back to the bowler
flighted on middle and leg, charges down the track and thwacks it over midwicket for a couple of runs
full, just outside off, driven gently towards mid-off for a quick single
targeting middle, comes down the track and drives it past the bowler, just wide of mid-on, for another single
threw it up outside off, pushed to cover off the front foot
on target, slightly short on the off stump, pushed through to mid-off
fullish outside off, got to the pitch and squeezed it through cover and point for a couple as Williams gives chase and cuts it off

appeal for run-out, overpitched outside off, tried to drill it hard down the ground, mistimed it to mid-off and raced through for a single, just made it in time as Utseya scored a direct hit at the non-striker's end

gone, Williams takes a sharp one at point, short and wide, goes for the cut, fails to keep it down and Williams tries to hold on to it over his head, it slips out and he juggles on a couple of occasions to snap it in the end, held his nerve there
firing it down the leg side, another wide, another run gifted
swinging in from outside off, Ashraful was half-forward when he was rapped on the pads but off the inside edge which saved him
angling in towards middle and leg, closes the face and turns it to midwicket
tossed up outside off, driven down to long-off for a single
spinning in from outside off, bowled it flat, defended watchfully back to the bowler
slightly short outside off, dropped his hands there, tapped it just wide of point for a single
slightly short outside off, smacked off the back foot to extra cover, there's a fumble but no single on offer
shortish on the off stump, forced off the back to in the same region
on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
targeting on middle and off, closes the face to work it to midwicket
landed on a good length just outside off, driven down to long-off for a single
nicely done, third man is up and Ashraful tries to cut that short one past him but the fielder dived well to his right to prevent a few runs
overpitched on middle, dug out back to the bowler
lands on a good length on middle, defended with a straight bat just wide of the bowler
slower one this time, bowled full outside off, gets forward and square-drives it to point
pitched up but there's deep cover, driven straight to him for a single
pitched up on middle, drives it through the line past the bowler onto the stumps at the non-striker's end
short of a good length just outside off, gets forward and taps it back to the bowler
slower one bowled full on middle, eased wide of cover for a single
overpitched on middle and leg, forces it through to midwicket, is unable to find the gap
excellent keeping by Taylor as he flings himself to his right after Tamim gets a faint tickle on it as he tries to work it away fine
shortish outside off, chopped wide of the diving cover for just a single
fullish on middle and leg, forced it past the diving Ray Price at midwicket
slower one down the leg side, gets a touch on it, getting it to roll wide of short fine for a single
landed on a good length outside off and moved back in, defended with bat close to pad, was in fact struck high on the pads as he didn't expect it to move in
a touch too straight, turned away into the leg side wide of square leg for a single
close shout for lbw, moved in just a hint from a good length on middle towards leg, was only half-forward, tried to work it square but was struck on the pads, replays show it may have just gone down
slower one bowled full outside off, eased through to deep cover for a single
short and wide and he latches on to it, smacks it away hard off the back foot through a diving extra cover for a boundary
slower one bowled full outside off, driven down towards long-off for a single
shortish on middle and off, gets a single down to deep point
slower one bowled full on middle, pushed back to the bowler from the crease
sliding it in from outside off, reaches forward, opens the face and drops it to point
tossed up just outside off, driven straight to extra cover
spinning in from a good length outside off, defended just wide of the bowler
short, makes room and cuts it down behind deep point for a couple of runs
frees his arms and looks to clear cover but is unable to make contact, spun back in just a fraction to miss off
chopped down through the in-field on the off side for a single to deep point
drifting in towards middle, driven down to long-off for a single
tossed up outside off, lands short, turns back in, slapped down to deep point for a single
angling it in towards middle, closes the face and defends it into the leg side
appeared to go with the arm there, shortish on the off, pushed to cover from the crease

gone, Ashraful's patience was being tested and Ray Price has snapped him with a tossed-up delivery. Much slower through the air, gave it plenty of air, Ashraful was tempted, made room and tried to hoick it over the in-field on the off side but couldn't keep it down, Coventry was positioned perfectly at extra cover and though that was struck hard, he was sharp to react and hold on, big blow.
flighted it on middle, got across the line to work it square, got an inside edge into his pads
slightly short on middle, moves back and punches it down the ground to long-on
gets forward and works it away wide of square leg for a single
tossed it up on leg stump, driven down to long-on for a single
tossed up on middle and off, pushed through to midwicket
slightly short on leg stump, shuffles across and bunts it to deep square leg for a single
throws it up but it's down the leg side, given a wide
poor one, another one hurled down the leg side, misdirected, costs them another run, brings up the 100
slightly short on the off, cut away down to deep point for a single
slightly short outside off, from over the wicket, waited for it to turn in and dabbed it behind short third for a single
got the leading edge there, tossed it up, drifted in towards middle and then spun away as he tried to close the face, landed short of cover

dropped, tossed up on middle, came forward and tried to sweep it fine, got the top edge and Sibanda at short fine went the wrong way initially and then had to dive hard to his left to snap that but was unable to
another wide down the leg side, this is really indisciplined bowling from Zimbabwe
shortish outside off, smacks it hard off the back foot between long-off and deep cover for a couple
short on middle, pulled away to deep midwicket for a single
tossed up on middle, driven straight to cover
went on straight, Tamim was pushed all the way back, punched it to midwicket
tossed up, drew him out of the crease, drove it back straight to the bowler
slightly short on middle, punched away to cover off the back foot, four dot balls
short again, gets a single this time as he bunts it to deep cover off the back foot
fires it hard on middle and leg, tries to work it away but is struck on the pads as it turns down, just one off the over
flighted on middle, gets across and turns it away to short fine
short on middle, forces it off the back foot down the ground to long-on for a single to bring up his half-century, long way to go still
slower through the air, flighted on leg stump, dropped into the leg side
bowled on middle and off, gets into position early to play the reverse-sweep, places it well in front of short third for a boundary
flighted on middle and leg, driven down to long-on for a single
Tamim didn't want to waste that, it was tossed up on middle, came down the track and smashed it miles over long-on for a big six
another one, over long-off this time, flatter but dances down and takes it on a length, clears the field with a free swing of the arms, seemed for a moment that he had miscued it but he hadn't
he's cutting loose now, short and wide, waits for it to turn away and crashes it wide of deep cover, had a lot of power behind that shot and it just raced away
smacked off the back foot towards deep cover for a single
tossed up just outside off, gets across and drives it straight to midwicket
gave it some air again, pushed through the line to long-off for a single
worked into the leg side off the front foot for a single
slightly short on the off, struck hard but straight to cover
slightly short outside off, tapped towards extra cover where Matsikenyeri dives to save the single
on middle and leg, gets back and works it uppishly just wide of midwicket for a single
angling it on the pads, worked away wristily wide of short fine for a single
back of a length outside off, cracked stylishly off the back foot through a diving extra cover for a couple
shortish just outside off, appeared to stop on him just a touch, punched to mid-off
short and wide, gets back and bunts it down to deep cover for a single
back of a length on middle, tried to guide it past point but is unable to
short and wide, cut away hard wide of deep point where a fumble by Coventry gives them just about enough time to come back for the second
lands on a good length just outside off, tries to cream it down the ground but Chigumbura gets a hand to it
another wide down the leg side, rubbish
flighted on middle, gets front and across and defends it into the leg side
slightly short on middle, slapped to midwicket off the back foot
tossing it up, lands full on middle, worked off the back foot to square leg
Gave it some air and Tamim was ready, took a couple of steps down, got under it and walloped it a fair distance over long-on for his third six
bowled it full outside off, driven down to long-off for a single
slightly short on middle, pushed back to the bowler
another miscount by the umpire, one more seven-ball over, pushed down the ground to long-on
short of a good length outside off, knocked down to long-on for a single
short of a good length on middle, worked away behind square for a single
straying on the pads, Raqibul's strong square of the wicket, turns it down into the deep for another single
slower one deceives the left hander, short and cut away, Tamim was into the pull too early
got it to move back in from a good length outside off, Tamim was late in bringing his bat down, just about managed to get an inside edge and it rolled just wide of the leg stump
slower one bowled short again, goes for the pull, mistimes it just short of midwicket for a quick single
short on leg stump, whipped away towards long leg for a single
spun in from outside off, shuffled across to turn it past square leg for a single
fullish on middle, pushed it wide of midwicket for a single
shortish on the off stump, pushed through to midwicket on the back foot
flighted outside off, driven straight to midwicket
turning in, waits for it and just taps it wide of point for a single to keep the strike, they're doing this nicely
slightly short outside off, pushed down the ground towards mid-off
back of a length on the off stump, pulled away to deep square leg for one more
kept a little low, shortish outside off, jabbed it down to third man for one more
angling it in towards middle, pushed away off the front foot to midwicket
lands on a good length outside off, leans into a drive as he strokes it to cover, struck well but straight to the fielder
short of a good length on the off, drops it from the crease short of point, calls for a single but Tamim sends him back
tries to work it square, is struck on the pads, they get a leg bye
tossed up outside off, reverse-sweeps it down to short third
punched off the back foot down to long-on for a single
fired it down the leg side, went for the sweep and there was a sound as it zipped past, it was the bat hitting the ground, called a wide
spinning in from outside off, defended to cover
another wide down the leg side, add to that a fumble by the keeper and they get three in all, poor stuff
overpitched outside off, drive hard down the ground to long-off, Williams misfields and allows them to get back for the second
slightly short just on the off stump, just eased through to cover
smashed hard, short and wide, struck down the stumps at the non-striker's end, just manages a single off the deflection, powerfully struck but just one run earnt
angling it in towards the off stump, pushed with a straight bat to cover
back of a length on the off, punched down to long-off for a single
pitched up on leg stump, picked the gap well, drove it in the yawning gap between long-on and deep midwicket, had plenty of time to come back for the second
threw it up on middle, came down the track and drove it down to long-on
shortish on the off, pushed through wide of extra cover but there's no run available
short again, hit hard off the back foot wide of deep cover, three more to the total as he drags it back in
short of a length, cut away behind point for a single
hurled full on middle, driven straight o midwicket
short on leg stump, turning in, moves back and punches it down to long-on for a single
low full toss on the off stump, driven down to deep cover for a single
lands on a good length on middle and off, gets across to paddle that fine, is struck on the pads but outside the line
too many singles on offer and Bangladesh are milking the field nicely, drove it hard down to long-on for a single
overpitched, driven firmly wide of long-off for single, Waller cuts it off
much closer to the stumps, short of a good length on the off, pushed wide of cover, thinks of a single but is sent back
short of a length outside off, cut away straight to point
short on middle and leg, gets back and whips it through midwicket for a single,
pushed through short on middle, punched down to long-on for one more
pushed it quick on middle, gets across and tickles it through square leg, one more
threw it up a little, waited for it to turn away, moved away and tapped it behind point for a single
slightly short on middle, worked away to deep midwicket for a single
no trouble whatsoever, worked away between square leg and midwicket
short outside off, rocks back and cuts it down to deep point for a single
pushed through quick on middle, driven to long-off, goes to 99
shortish outside off, pushed through to deep cover for a single
fullish down the leg wide, tickled to short fine
flighted it on middle and leg, driven down to midwicket, still no run
shortish on middle and off, turned away, he struck it straight to cover, a bit of frustration there
angling it in towards middle, pushed away to square leg
tossed up on middle, closed the face, dropped it into the leg side for a quick single
again straight to the fielder, short on middle, punched straight to midwicket
the pressure builds, the frustration sets in as he defends it back to the bowler
short on the off, turning in, played it straight back to the bowler, five dot balls
gets it this time, did so easily in the end, just turned it wide of midwicket to reach his second ODI ton, a fairly subdued celebration as he realises there's still a fair way to go
...to be smacked for six! Length ball outside off, Tamim latches onto it quickly, lofting it high and handsome over long-off for a big one
short of a good length on middle, worked it away behind square for a single
fullish outside off, driven down to long-on for a single
another one! Just cleared Waller, lands on a good length outside off, he had made his mind up, had a good hard smack at it and fortunately for him, he had enough on it to take it just over long-off
back of a length on middle, pulled away to deep square leg for a single
fires it down the leg side for the umpteenth time, one more to the total
Raqibul's been impressive, overpitched on middle, flicked it away in front of square for a couple more
slightly short on the, singles continue to flow, punched down to long-off
got him! Price is uncontrollable, sending off Raqibul. Went straight on, landed on middle, Raqibul made room to cut, it kept low, he missed and the middle stump was out of the ground
off the mark straightaway, short on middle, swatted it down to long-on
fired it on a good length on middle, worked away wristily through square leg for a single
tossed up on middle and leg, driven back to the bowler and is met with a stare from the charged-up Price
Shakib continues the good work, it's tossed up outside off and he bends low to sweep it hard between deep square leg and deep midwicket, split them perfectly
flighted on leg stump, driven down to long-on for a single
the wicket has no impact on Shakib, senses a chance and takes full toll, flighted on middle, gets into position and slog-sweeps it powerfully into the stands for a monstrous six
pushed off the front foot wide of cover
gets down to play the sweep, is struck on the pads, a bit of bat there as well as it rolls to short fine
worked away wide of midwicket for a single

dropped, Chigumbura the man in the hot seat. Perhaps a decisive moment as Tamim charges down the track to clear long-off but doesn't get hold of it, takes forever to come down and Chigumbura, though positioned perfectly, misjudged it at the last moment as it fell behind him
punished, short on leg stump, a hit-me ball, pulled away over short fine for a boundary, they're coasting now, what a miss that was!
full outside off, a little uppish as he drives it hard past a diving extra cover for a single
overpitched on middle, driven back to the bowler, the dot ball elicits a cheer from the crowd
in the blockhole on middle, dug out back to the bowler
slower one bowled on a good length on middle and leg, pushed down to long-on for a single
four more, full outside leg stump, picks it up cleanly to dispatch it wide of fine leg for a one bounce four
slower one bowled on a good length on middle, pushed through point for a single
overpitched on middle and off, struck back to the bowler
it's going Bangladesh's way, full and wide, tries to crash it through the covers, gets a thick outside edge over short third man for a boundary
slightly short on middle, cracked down to long-on for a single

Shakib's gone! Was done in by the slower one, landed full on the off, he couldn't restrain himself there, tried to dismiss it over long-on, ended up miscuing it straight to Waller at long-off who takes it comfortably, is there a twist?
sloppy stuff, short on leg stump, turned it to short fine, Tamim called for a single but the batsman was ball-watching, Matsikenyeri hurled a wayward throw and conceded an extra run
slightly short on the off, pushed off the back foot to midwicket
quicker through the air, short on middle, pulled away just wide of Waller at deep midwicket, two taken
shortish on the off, slapped down to long-on for a single
short on middle, pulled away uppishly, falls just short of square leg, inches short,ooh
tossed up outside off, pushed gently wide of the bowler and midwicket for a single to long-on to keep the strike
doesn't look like it, short on middle, Tamim adds insult to injury by pulling it hard over midwicket, a massive gap between long-on and deep midwicket and he finds it
low full toss on middle, drilled hard down to long-on for a single
lands on a good length outside off, driven on the up wide of long-off for a single
pitched up on middle and off, swung away to deep square leg for one more
slower one bowled short outside off, cut back in, dabbed down to third man for a single
targeting the blockhole, converts it into a low full toss and bunts it down to long-on for a single
tossed up outside off, driven straight to extra cover
short on leg stump, whipped away to deep midwicket for one more
turned away to short fine
short and wide, cut away to deep point for a single
worked away to deep square leg for a single
tossed up on middle, driven down the ground to long-on for one more, Mushfiqur appears to have settled in nicely
overpitched on middle, driven down to long-on for a single
Tamim launches into that one, length delivery yet again, waits for it, makes room and pelts that into the stands for six more
held it back slightly, dragged down to long-on for a single
full on middle, clipped wide of midwicket for a quick single, sensible stuff
fullish on middle, pushed back to the bowler from the crease
slower one bowled on a good length outside off, punches it down to long-on to bring up another landmark, the first for a Bangladeshi in an ODI, reaches 150, well done
tossed up outside leg stump, swept down to short fine
slogs it, was not in the slot, not to the pitch but can afford to take such risks with the field up, short on middle, swings it away over square leg for four more
he's gone now, finally! Tossed up outside off, stepped out of the crease and tried to whack him over midwicket, got the leading edge and Sibanda took it well running to his left at short fine
flighted on middle, swung away to deep midwicket for a single
pushed off the front foot wide of long-off for a couple more, Waller takes too long to cut that off, should have been quicker to get off the blocks there
that'll ease the pressure now, short and wide, makes room to cut that hard past point for a boundary, picked the gap between short third and point to perfection, well played
on middle and leg, clips it over midwicket for a couple more
low full toss on middle, driven down to long-on for a single
slower one down the leg side, helped on its way to fine leg for a single
overpitched outside off, drive hard past the bowler just wide of mid-off for a single
four more, short on leg stump, moves across and pulls it fine, Taylor dives to his left but is unable to clasp it, four more to the score, they're inching closer, poor delivery
low full toss on middle, worked away to deep midwicket for a single
fullish on the off stump, struck down to short fine, there's no single
atrocious stuff, hurls a wide down the leg side
short outside off, cut away to deep point for a single
pitched up on middle, driven hard in front of deep midwicket for a couple more
a wicket, is it too late? Fires it quick on the off, goes for the big sweep over square leg, misses it completely, spins in and strikes him right in front of middle, that was plumb
full toss on middle, driven down the ground for a single to long-on
hurled in full on the off, dropped short of the bowler, a dot delivery
yorker on middle, defended in front of the bowler, calls for a single but is wisely sent back
poor ball, full toss on middle and leg, picked up over square leg into the deep for a couple of runs, just ten more now
ridiculous stuff, full toss on leg stump, above waist high, helped down to fine leg for one more, that's a no-ball for height
held back the length this time, slower one bowled short on middle, defended into the leg side

faint tickle takes it all the way to the boundary, full outside leg stump, it's criminal to be bowling that line at this stage of the innings, just had to get his bat to it and the outfield did the rest
that seals it, slower one bowled full, he drills it down the ground past the bowler to the boundary to seal the series for Bangladesh
